name: MixedInkGroups

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the MixedInkGroup.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Creates a new mixed ink group.

parameters.name: inkList
parameters.description: The inks to include in the mix.

parameters.name: inkPercentages
parameters.description: The percent of each ink in the ink list. (Range: 0 to 100 for each ink) (Optional)

parameters.name: repeatValues
parameters.description: The number of repetitions for each ink in the ink list. (Range: 0 to 100 for each ink) (Optional)

parameters.name: incrementValues
parameters.description: The increment percent per repetition for each ink. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: The cumulative ink percentage per ink cannot exceed 100.) (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new MixedInkGroup (Optional)

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the MixedInkGroups within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The MixedInkGroup, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: MixedInkGroup, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The MixedInkGroup, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: MixedInkGroup, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first MixedInkGroup in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last MixedInkGroup in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle MixedInkGroup in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the MixedInkGroup that follows the desired MixedInkGroup.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the MixedInkGroup whose index follows the specified MixedInkGroup in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The MixedInkGroup whose index comes before the desired MixedInkGroup.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any MixedInkGroup in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every MixedInkGroup in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MixedInkGroup.
Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified index.

description: A collection of mixed ink groups.
